items.subject: Bitcoin Park Austin: Austin Bitdevs Reminder
items.body:
Friends - quick reminder that Austin Bitdevs is this Thursday, April 17th at Bitcoin Park Austin (formerly the Bitcoin Commons). Same location, same vibe, new and renewed energy! 7-9pm, doors open 6:30pm. Sign up with link below:


https://www.meetup.com/bitcoin-park-austin/events/304930332/


Also, if you didn't know, we've also begun hosting a range of events at Park Austin during the same week as Bitdevs. Links below to other events:


Austin Bitcoin Design Club: tonight 6:30pm Tues April 15th

The Satoshi Papers (Meet the Authors): tomorrow Wed Apr 16th 3:30pm

Austin AI Meetup (hosted by Justin Moon & Anthony Ronning): tomorrow Wed Apr 16th 7pm


Look forward to seeing folks out there!


Best, Parker

items.subject: Explore Our Messaging API
items.body:
Hello Lucas,

Thank you for creating an account on Unipile. You have now access to our messaging API, allowing you to integrate messaging channels like LinkedIn, Email or WhatsApp into your software to enhance your users’ experience.

So, what can you do now?

- Dashboard: Consult your account, generate your token, choose your subscription plan…
- Documentation: Getting started, connection methods, API reference…
- How to integrate in just few days: Take a look at how our clients integrate our API.

For any questions, you can contact me or you can join our Slack Community and engage with us through direct messaging.

If you prefer a more interactive approach, I am also available for a video call to discuss and address any questions you may have. Feel free to book a meeting in my calendar: https://calendar.app.google/qEnkwtNBpHq2yZx99

Thank you once again,

Best regards,


Julien Crépieux
Co-founder & CEO
Enhancing Message Sync for Your App with Unipile
